results.content: Only teaches how to make a crud! It spends a lot of time showing the laravel and the basis of a secure election system doesn't show anything!!

response.content: Students must understand the basics first. If you know the basics you can skip over to the part that explains the voting system. As for the security aspect, the system was built on Laravel which has a great security system, especially the latest version.
response.content_html: Students must understand the basics first. If you know the basics you can skip over to the part that explains the voting system. As for the security aspect, the system was built on Laravel which has a great security system, especially the latest version.
